## Work experience

6 years of experience in two different biostatics unit associated to two hospitals in Spain. My tasks were to perform & design statistical analysis for a wide range of clinical studies, reporting statistical analysis to researchers and clinicians, performing statistical research and web application programming in shiny:

- Statistic in Biostatistics Support and Research Unit in _Germans Trias i Pujol Research Institute and Hospital (IGTP)_, Badalona, Spain. 2023-Current

- Statistic in Biostatics Unit in _Bellvitge Biomedical Research Institute (IDIBELL)_, L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Spain. 2019-2023
